entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon and ending late in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
